trait.name: Dwarven Resilience
entries: Bud Light has advantage on saving throws against poison, and has resistance against poison damage.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 2} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Grovel
entries: Bud Light falls {@condition prone} and gains advantage on his next Charisma (Persuasion) ability check until he stands up or until the end of his next turn.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Dwango casts one of the following spells, using Charisma as his spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 12}):

trait.name: Dwarven Resilience
entries: Dwango has advantage on saving throws against poison, and has resistance against poison damage.

action.name: Pickaxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) piercing damage, or 9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) piercing damage if used with two hands.

bonus.name: Dynaschmite
entries: Immediately after Dwango hits a target with an attack roll, he can expend one use of his spellcasting to deal an additional 9 ({@damage 2d8}) radiant damage. The damage increases by 4 ({@damage 1d8}) if the target is an undead or a fiend.

trait.name: Dwarven Resilience
entries: Klint has advantage on saving throws against poison and resistance against poison damage.

trait.name: Reckless
entries: At the start of his turn, Klint can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls during that turn, but attack rolls against him have advantage until the start of his next turn.

action.name: Greataxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d12 + 4}) slashing damage, or 12 ({@damage 1d12 + 6}) slashing damage plus 5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) radiant damage while raging.

bonus.name: Rage (3/Day)
entries: Klint becomes enraged and gains advantage on Strength checks and Strength saving throws, a +2 bonus to weapon attack damage rolls, and resistance to bludgeoning, piercing and slashing damage. The rage lasts for 1 minute. It ends early if Klint is knocked {@condition unconscious} or if his turn ends and he hasn't taken damage or attacked a hostile creature since his last turn.

trait.name: Dwarven Resilience
entries: Fireball has advantage on saving throws against poison and resistance against poison damage.

trait.name: Drunken Technique
entries: Whenever Fireball uses a bonus action to make an unarmed strike, he gains the benefit of the Disengage action, and his walking speed increases by 10 feet until the end of his turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Fireball makes two attacks with his unarmed strike, and can choose to make two additional unarmed strikes as a bonus action.

action.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage. Once on each of his turns, Fireball can also try to stun his target. If he does so, the target must succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition stunned} until the end of Fireball's next turn.

bonus.name: Potion of Fire Breath (3/Day)
entries: Fireball exhales fire at a target within 30 feet of him. The target must make a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw, taking 14 ({@damage 4d6}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one.

bonus.name: Amulet of the Drunkard (1/Day)
entries: Fireball drinks some ale, regaining ({@dice 4d4 + 4}) hit points.

trait.name: Beast of Burden
entries: Lariette is considered to be one size larger for the purpose of determining him carrying capacity.

action.name: Gore
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) piercing damage. If Lariette moved at least 20 feet straight toward the target immediately before the hit, the target takes an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Dwarven Resilience
entries: Slate has advantage on saving throws against poison and resistance against poison damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Slate makes one unarmed strike, and can make an additional unarmed strike as a bonus action.

action.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) bludgeoning damage, or 7 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) slashing damage while raging.

bonus.name: Rage (2/Day)
entries: Slate becomes enraged and gains advantage on Strength checks and Strength saving throws, a +2 bonus to weapon attack damage rolls, and resistance to bludgeoning, piercing and slashing damage. The rage lasts for 1 minute. It ends early if Slate is knocked {@condition unconscious} or if his turn ends and he hasn't taken damage or attacked a hostile creature since his last turn.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Urqell casts one of the following spells, using Wisdom as his spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 14}):

trait.name: Dwarven Resilience
entries: Urqell has advantage on saving throws against poison and resistance against poison damage.

action.name: Grandma's Keg
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Guiding Bolt (3/Day)
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 6} to hit, range 120 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 4d6}) radiant damage, and the next attack roll made against this target before the end of Urqell's next turn has advantage.

bonus.name: Blessed Brew (7/Day)
entries: Urquell distributes blessed brew one willing creature within 5 feet. The creature can choose to benefit from one of the following effects for 1 hour: advantage on Charisma-based skill checks, a +1 bonus to AC, or a +1 increase to the DC of saving throws against their castings of enchantment spells.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting.
headerEntries: Judi Tinkard is a 4th-level wizard. Her spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 13}, {@hit 5} to hit with spell attacks). She has the following wizard spells prepared.

trait.name: Dwarven Resilience
entries: Judi has advantage on saving throws against poison and resistance against poison damage.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) piercing damage in melee, or 3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) piercing damage at range.

action.name: Annoying Blabber
entries: Judi goes on an rant about how something reminds her of an historical event, to the annoyance of everyone around her. All creatures within 30 feet of Judi must then make a {@dc 10} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, a creature must spend their next turn attacking Judi.
